alert.note: Alert for Harnett; Johnston; Sampson; Wayne (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 9:19PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wayne, northwestern Sampson, east central Harnett and southern Johnston Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 919 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Dunn, or 12 miles southeast of Lillington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, dangerous lightning, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dunn, Benson, Erwin, Coats, Newton Grove, Hobbton and Spivey`s Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
